modName: DB Armor converted to heavy - Vanilla and UNP compatible
summary: Converts Shrouded Armor into Heavy Armor - Not a default replacement.
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone!
This is my first upload, so I did some extensive testing to be sure it works as I would like it to.
I have converted the Shrouded Armor into heavy armor, simply because I was unhappy with the fact my heavy armor wearers could not benefit from the Dark Brotherhood quests other than by having gold handed to them.
It is compatible with the UNP body (tested by two people) and the Vanilla body.
Also compatible with skimpy and non-skimpy armor replacements for UNP

THIS IS NOT A REPLACEMENT!!!
Simply type this into the console for a list of the armor IDs: Help \"Heavy Shrouded\" 0
I would love to simply have put it in a chest in the Falkreath sanctuary for easy access, but alas I am new to modding and am not quite sure how that\'s done yet.

Credits:
- dimon99 for the UNP body found here:
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709

- Exeter for the UNP vanilla armor replacements found here:
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7305

- Nightasy for the Skimpy UNP armor found here:
http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9546

Also Bethesda for the game.
author: TAskew
